title: MediCore360 – Hospital Management System
description: An integrated hospital management platform automating feedback, fleet, laundry, and repair workflows. Designed to streamline operational visibility, improve resource tracking, and enhance patient experience across multiple departments.

screenshots.title: Dashboard Overview
screenshots.description: Centralized dashboard visualizing hospital KPIs, maintenance tasks, and live patient feedback.

screenshots.title: Maintenance Module
screenshots.description: Tracks repair and logistics requests across hospital facilities for faster resolution.

title: ConstructEase – Construction Management Suite
description: A responsive web platform built for construction companies to manage projects, workers, and analytics dashboards. Focused on simplifying data collection and improving site collaboration.

screenshots.title: Project Dashboard
screenshots.description: Tracks live project progress and visualizes materials usage through interactive charts.

screenshots.title: Task Management
screenshots.description: Collaborative task board for engineers, supervisors, and contractors.

title: InsightFlow – Data Science & Research Platform
description: A research and analytics system for startups. Built data pipelines, ETL automation, and ML-driven insights dashboards. Designed to test hypotheses and visualize performance trends.

screenshots.title: Data Dashboard
screenshots.description: Displays machine learning predictions and performance insights in real time.

screenshots.title: ETL Workflow
screenshots.description: Automated ETL and model deployment pipeline for experimental datasets.
